BXObjectStatusInfo Class Reference
BaseTen

Overview

A proxy for retrieving database object status.

See also
ValueTransformers

Instance Methods

(id) - valueForKey:
 

Method Documentation

- (id) valueForKey: (NSString *)  aKey

Returns a status constant for the given key.

The constant may then be passed to value transformers in BaseTenAppKit.

Parameters
aKeyAn NSString that corresponds to a field name.
Returns
An NSValue that contains the constant.
